info: The third and last series released for Gundam M.S War based on the original Mobile Suit Gundam anime series. There was no booster set released for this series. Although there were images of booster packs on the starter deck box, none exist. There are no Gold Stamped card in this series either.

cards.name: Side-7
cards.battle_scars: Destroy two of your M.S. cards.

effect.text: Reduce all EF M.S. and Pilot cards' Price by 1.

cards.name: Luna II
cards.battle_scars: Destroy one of your M.S. cards.

effect.text: Increase all EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards' Clash Points by 1.

cards.requirements: More than 1 EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' card.

cards.name: Jabrow
cards.battle_scars: Opponent draw 3 cards from their Supply Base.

effect.text: Increase all Defending M.S. cards' Clash Points by 1.

cards.requirements: More than 2 EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards.

cards.name: Operation V
cards.effect: Move a Gundam M.S. card from the Dry Dock to your hand.

cards.name: Into the Atmosohere
cards.effect: Decrease all M.S. cards' Clash Points by 3 (even your own).

cards.name: Minovsky Particles
cards.effect: Void the effect of Event cards requiring you to send cards from your hand to the Dry Dock.

cards.name: Supply Corps
cards.effect: Send a card from your hand to the Dry Dock to draw a card from your Supply Base.

cards.name: Antiaircraft Fire
cards.effect: Reduce a M.S. Type 'Battleship' card of your choice's Clash Points by 5.

cards.name: Mass Production
cards.effect: Reduce the Price of a M.S. card by 1 if a M.S. card with exactly the same name is in play.

cards.name: The Solar System
cards.effect: Destroy an opponent's Battlefield card and M.S. card of your choice.

cards.name: RX-78-2 Gundam
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 2 when Amuro Ray or Sayla Mass is attached.

cards.name: RX-77-2 Guncannon
cards.effect: Reduce one opposing M.S. card of your choice's Clash Points by 3 at the end of your Preliminary Phase. You cannot Attack or Defend until your next Attack Phase.

cards.name: RX-75 Guntank
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when Attacking with Gundam or Guncannon.

cards.name: RGM-79 GM
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when Defending.

cards.name: Core Fighter
cards.effect: Reduce the Price of all RX-78-2 Gundam cards by 1 when this card is in play.

cards.name: G-Fighter
cards.effect: Increase the Clash Points of all RX-78-2 Gundam cards by 1 when this card Attacks with RX-78-2 Gundam. This card cannot be placed on the M.S. Dock when G-Bull or G-Sky M.S. cards are in play.

cards.name: G-Bull
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when Defending. This card can not be placed on the M.S. Dock when G-Fighter or G-Sky M.S. cards are in play.

cards.name: RB-79 Ball
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when Attacking with GM.

cards.name: White Base
cards.effect: Opponents must Defend when this card Attacks. If opponent cannot Defend, they take Battle Damage.

cards.name: Magellan
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when your Battlefield is in play.

cards.name: Big Tray
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when an unattached Pilot card you placed on the M.S. Dock is in play.

cards.name: Medea
cards.effect: Reduse Clash Points damage (except by Attack) to M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards by 1 when this card is in play.

cards.name: Amuro Ray
cards.effect: Only a M.S. card with 'Newtype' Pilot attached can Defend when a M.S. card with this Pilot Attacks

cards.name: Sayla Mass
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1.

cards.name: Kai Shiden
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2. A M.S. card with this Pilot attached must pay 1 Price to Attack.

cards.name: Hayato Kobayashi
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2 when Defending. Return this Pilot to the bottom of your Supply Base when a M.S. card with this Pilot attached is destroyed.

cards.name: Bright Noah
cards.effect: Place this Pilot on your M.S. Dock to increase all your EF M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards' Clash Points by 1. This card remains in effect until destroyed.

cards.name: Mirai Yashima
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2 when this Pilot is attached to M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards.

cards.name: Ryu Jose
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1. Destroy a M.S. card with this Pilot attached to send an opponent's M.S. card of your choice to their Dry Dock.

cards.name: Matilda Ajan
cards.effect: When a M.S. card with this Pilot attached is not destroyed when Defending, send 1 card of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand.

cards.name: North America
cards.battle_scars: Destroy one of your M.S. cards.

effect.text: Increase all PZ M.S. Type 'Battleship' cards' Clash Points by 1.

cards.name: The Zeon Mining Region
cards.battle_scars: Keep one card of your choice and discard the rest of your hand.

effect.text: You may draw a card from your Supply Base at each player's Preliminary Phase.

cards.requirements: More than 1 PZ M.S. Type 'Mobile Armor' card.

effect.text: Reduce all PZ M.S. and Event cards' Price by 1.

cards.name: The Red Comet
cards.effect: Send a M.S. card with 'Gundam' in its name from an opponent's hand to the Dry Dock.

cards.name: Speech
cards.effect: Increase the Clash Points of all M.S. cards with Pilot attached by 1.

cards.name: Guerrilla Band
cards.effect: An opponent receives Battle Damage equal to the number of Pilot cards in play.

cards.name: Jet-Stream Attack
cards.effect: When 3 M.S. cards with exactly the same name are in play, Increase their Clash Points by 2.

cards.name: Spy
cards.effect: Send an opponent's Event card of your choice from opponent's hand to the Dry Dock.

cards.name: Ma Kube's Tactics's
cards.effect: Send an opponent's Battlefield card or 3 of opponent's choice from their hand to the Dry Dock.

cards.name: MS-06S Char's Zaku
cards.effect: This card can be moved back to the M.S. Dock immediately after your Attack Phase when Char Aznable is attached.

cards.name: MS-05 Zaku I
cards.effect: Thing card can't Attack without a Pilot.

cards.name: MS-05F Zaku II
cards.effect: Increase Clash Point by 1 when Attacking.

cards.name: MS-07B Gouf
cards.effect: Increase the damage by Heat Rod Event card to an opponent by 1 when this card is in play.

cards.name: MS-09 Dom
cards.effect: Increase Clash Point by 1 when Attacking.

cards.name: MSM-07S Char's Z'Gok
cards.effect: Only M.S. Type 'Sea' cards can Defend against Char's Z'Gok.

cards.name: MSM-07 Z'Gok
cards.effect: Increase Clash Points by 1 when an opponent Defends with a M.S. card that isn't Type 'Sea'.

cards.name: MAM-07 Grabro
cards.effect: Only M.S. Type 'Sea' cards can Defend against Grabro.

cards.name: MAX-03 Azzam
cards.effect: Move 1 card from an opponent's Supply Bas to the Dry Dock instead of Attacking.

cards.name: MSM-04 Acguy
cards.effect: Only M.S. Type 'Sea' cards can Defend against Acguy.

cards.name: Dopp
cards.effect: If this card is destroyed when Gau M.S. card is in play, return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Char's Musai
cards.effect: Destroy this card to move your Char's Zaku from the Dry Dock to your hand.

cards.name: Gau
cards.effect: Return all Dopp M.S. cards from the Dry Dock to the Supply Base and reshuffle.

cards.name: Zanzibar
cards.effect: Destroy this card to move PZ M.S. cards of your choice from the Dry Dock to top of your Supply Base (Maximum 3 cards).

cards.name: Char Aznable
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2 when Attacking or Defending a M.S. card with 5 Clash Points or above.

cards.name: Garma Zabi
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1. When this Pilot is attached to a PZ M.S. Type 'Battleship' card, increase your Clash Points by 2.

cards.name: Ranba Ral
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2. When a M.S. card with Pilot attached is destroy, send this card to the Defunct pile.

cards.name: Clawle Hamon
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1. If any Pilot cards are in your Dry Dock, increase Clash Points by 2.

cards.name: Ma Kube
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1. Reduce a PZ Event card's Price by 1 when this Pilot is in play.

cards.name: The Black Trinary
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 2 when Attacking. Reduce Clash Points by 1 when Defending.

cards.name: Flanagan Boone
cards.effect: Increase your Clash Points by 1 and add M.S. Type 'Sea'.
